com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla

Class NotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.NotificationManager

  • public class NotificationManager
extends android.content.ContextWrapper
    NotificationManager Singleton object that deals with notifications of the current user.
    See Also:
    Notification, NotificationsFragment, NotificationsController
